text: Budium ( Boúdeion) or Budea (Βούδεια Boúdeia) was a town of Magnesia in ancient Thessaly, mentioned by Homer in the Iliad. Apparently, there was a cult of Athena Boudeia at the town. The site of Budium is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Ancient Magnesia Category:Locations in the Iliad Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Boudeion
